meta.name: description
meta.content: If you’re looking for a reputable school for your kids, turn to none other than Iraan-Sheffield ISD in Iraan, TX. The curriculums and other programs we offer include Pre-Kindergarten to Grade 12 students. Contact us to learn more about enrolling your kids into our respectable institute.

a.title: IRAAN-SHEFFIELD ISD BOARD OF TRUSTEES NAMES FINALIST FOR SUPERINTENDENT

h3.a: IRAAN-SHEFFIELD ISD BOARD OF TRUSTEES NAMES FINALIST FOR SUPERINTENDENT

div.div: The Iraan-Sheffield ISD Board of Trustees, at its April 22, 2020 meeting, named Dr. Tracy Canter, currently from Ector County ISD, as finalist for superintendent. By law, the Board must now wait 21 days before voting to hire Dr. Canter to be the new superintendent for Iraan-Sheffield ISD. Canter is slated to replace out-going…
Here are the official results for the Cactus Relays
